```{r setup}
library(dataviz)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data_ala, aes(x=RT, group=Valence, color=Valence, fill=Valence)) +
    geom_density(alpha=0.5)+
    facet_wrap(~Valence, nrow=3)+
    scale_fill_manual(values=c("#F8766D", "#619CFF", "#00BA38" ))+
    scale_color_manual(values=c("#F8766D", "#619CFF", "#00BA38" ))
```
